shutdown.title: Warning
shutdown.content: Are you sure to turn off the Scrcpy control service?

deviceControl.controlInfo: The control service is starting. Please keep the device screen on.

Device.inputWirelessAddress: Please enter the wireless debugging address
Device.alreadyDisconnected: Controlled device connection has been disconnected

Mask.keyconfigException: The key mapping config is abnormal, please delete this config

checkUpdate.isLatest: Latest version: {0}, currently the latest version: {1}

noControledDevice.title: Controlled device not found
noControledDevice.content: Please go to the device page to control any device

Mask.sightMode: Mouse is locked, press {0} to unlock
Mask.checkAdb: adb is not available and the software cannot run normally. Fill in the path of the adb file in the setup page, or add the folder where it is located to the Path environment variable.: {0}
Mask.keyInputMode: Has entered the keystroke input mode, close this message to exit.

areaFormMissing.x: Enter the X coordinate of the mask upper left corner
areaFormMissing.y: Enter the Y coordinate of the mask upper left corner

Mask.incorrectArea: Please enter the coordinates and size of the mask correctly

areaPlaceholder.x: X coordinate of upper left corner

areaFormPlaceholder.y: Y coordinate of upper left corner

screenStream.addressPlaceholder: Please enter the ScreenStream screen mirror address

dialog.title: Warning
dialog.delKey: Data "{0}" is about to be deleted. The deletion operation is irreversible. Do you want to continue?
dialog.delAll: The data is about to be cleared. The operation is irreversible and the software will be restarted after clearing. Do you want to continue?

delLocalStore.warning:
Deleting data may lead to unpredictable consequences, so please operate with caution. 
If an exception occurs, please try clearing the data and restarting the software.

About.introduction: A Scrcpy client in Rust & Tarui aimed at providing mouse and key mapping to control Android device.
About.checkUpdateOnStartup: Check for software updates on startup

noSaveDialog.title: Warning
noSaveDialog.content: The current plan has not been saved. Do you want to save it?
noSaveDialog.keyRepeat: There are duplicate keystrokes and cannot be saved.

KeyCommon.macroParseSuccess: The macro code is parsed successfully, but the correctness of the code is not guaranteed. Please test by yourself.
KeyCommon.macroParseFailed: Macro code failed to save, please check whether the code format is correct.

macroModal.title: Macro editor
macroModal.placeholder: JSON macro code, can be empty
macroModal.loop: Macro executed on key press and hold

KeySetting.onlyOneConfig: There is currently only one config. Click Import Default to import the preset configs.
KeySetting.importDefaultFailed: Import of default key config failed
KeySetting.configEdited: Please save or reset the current config first
KeySetting.copyConfigSuccess: The config has been copied as: {0}
KeySetting.exportSuccess: The current key config has been exported to the clipboard
KeySetting.saveKeyRepeat: There are duplicate key and cannot be saved.
KeySetting.checkConfigSizeWarning: Please note that the current key config "{0}" is inconsistent with the mask size. You can migrate it if necessary.
KeySetting.migrateConfigNeedless: The current config conforms to the mask size and does not need to be migrated
KeySetting.importPlaceholder: Paste the JSON text of a key mapping config (the legality of the key mapping config cannot be judged here, please ensure that the JSON content is correct)
KeySetting.addButtonTip: Tip: Right-click on the blank area to add buttons

Swipe.intervalPlaceholder: Enter the time interval between points
Swipe.editTips:
Left-click on a blank area to add a new coordinate point. 
Left-click and drag to move a specific point, and right-click to delete the point.

websocket.error: Something was wrong, the exter connection is closed
